display_long_description:
Prepare for a pulse-pounding VR experience where the fate of humanity rests in your hands. Giant alien spiders and flying insectoids have invaded Earth, threatening to overrun major cities. As an elite member of the Military Gunship Corps, you’ll take the fight to the skies and the ground. With cutting-edge VR immersion, you'll alternate between gripping roles: piloting a heavily armed gunship helicopter, operating as a sharpshooting gunner, or leading daring ground rescue missions to save civilians trapped amidst the chaos.

In the cockpit, you'll wield the power of advanced military technology, mastering precision missile strikes and rapid-fire miniguns to obliterate alien swarms. Switch to the gunner seat to rain destruction from the side-mounted heavy cannons, testing your reflexes as flying insectoids dart and dive to evade your shots. But the action doesn’t stop there—deploy to the ground, helping trapped civilians reach the safety of a rope ladder while fending off monstrous alien spiders with close-range weaponry. Each role offers unique mechanics, from strategic airstrikes to tense ground combat.
